overview: Tom has been actively involved in digital design his entire career. At EQAL, Tom oversees the visual design, project management and front-end development teams. Long a proponent of the convergence of brands, entertaining content and community, Tom joined his kindred souls at EQAL in early 2011. Previously, Tom was SVP Managing Director of Digital at entertainment marketing giant Trailer Park where clients included Warner Brothers, MGM, Disney, Fox, Sony, as well as brands such as Nestle, Netflix, and Orbitz. He has also held leadership positions at some of the top creative agencies including Firstborn, Venables Bell & Partners and AKQA. He also led the interactive creative team for Pottery Barn brands for four years, including the successful launch of pbteen.com. A Northern California native, Tom relocated to sunny Los Angeles in 2007 and hasnâ€™t looked back. When not thinking about pixels and fonts, Tom enjoys his side passion of music and DJing.
